    • getRecentUpdatesByReviewers

      public List<application.Review> getRecentUpdatesByReviewers(List<String> trustedReviewerUsernames, Timestamp cutoffDate) throws SQLException
      Fetches recent reviews created after a specific cutoff date by a list of specified reviewers. Includes reviews linked via previousReviewId to trace updates.
      Parameters:
      trustedReviewerUsernames - List of usernames for trusted reviewers.
      cutoffDate - Timestamp defining the start date for "recent" reviews.
      Returns:
      List of recent Review objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addUserRole

      Adds a role to the target user. Returns true if the role was successfully added.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • removeUserRole

      public boolean removeUserRole(String adminUser, String targetUser, String role) throws SQLException
      Removes a role from the target user. Returns true if the role was successfully removed. For the "admin" role, additional restrictions apply: - An admin can only remove their own admin role. - The admin role cannot be removed if this is the only admin.
      Throws:
      SQLException

      Returns:
